text: Shooting, for the 2015 Island Games, takes place at the Crabbe Fullbore, Les Landes, Lecq ABT and Lecq Skeet ranges in Jersey. Competition took place from 27 June to 3 July 2015.2015 IG Shooting Schedule ==Medal table== ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- | ISSF 10m Air Pistol | || 188.7 | || 181.9 | || 160.6 |- | ISSF
